member.name: P:Argotic.Examples.MyCustomRssFeed.Format

member.name: P:Argotic.Examples.MyCustomRssFeed.Version
member.summary: Gets the of the that this syndication resource conforms to.

member.name: P:Argotic.Examples.MyCustomRssFeed.AsyncLoadHasBeenCancelled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the syndication resource asynchronous load operation was cancelled.
member.value: true if syndication resource asynchronous load operation has been cancelled, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Argotic.Examples.MyCustomRssFeed.LoadOperationInProgress
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the syndication resource is in the process of loading.

member.name: M:Argotic.Examples.MyCustomRssFeed.LoadAsync(System.Uri,System.Object)
member.summary: Loads this instance asynchronously using the specified .
member.param: A that represents the URL of the syndication resource XML data.
A user-defined object that is passed to the method invoked when the asynchronous operation completes.

remarks.para: The is loaded using the default .
To receive notification when the operation has completed or the operation has been canceled, add an event handler to the event. You can cancel a operation by calling the method.
After calling , you must wait for the load operation to complete before attempting to load the syndication resource using the method.

member.exception: The is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
The data does not conform to the expected syndication content format. In this case, the feed remains empty.
This has a call in progress.

member.name: M:Argotic.Examples.MyCustomRssFeed.LoadAsyncCancel
member.summary: Cancels an asynchronous operation to load this syndication resource.
member.remarks: Use the LoadAsyncCancel method to cancel a pending operation. If there is a load operation in progress, this method releases resources used to execute the load operation. If there is no load operation pending, this method does nothing.

member.name: M:Argotic.Examples.MyCustomRssFeed.AsyncLoadCallback(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Called when a corresponding asynchronous load operation completes.
member.param: The result of the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Argotic.Examples.MyCustomRssFeed.AsyncTimeoutCallback(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Represents a method to be called when a is signaled or times out.
member.param: An object containing information to be used by the callback method each time it executes.
true if the timed out; false if it was signaled.
